item.title: Developer Bytes - Plop
item.description: Update: If you would prefer to watch a video on this content, you can see the content here on YouTube: Developer Bytes - Generating Templates With Plopjs. For the first Developer Bytes article, I wanted to share with everyone a tool that I have found extremely useful and easy to use called Plop . Plop is a micro-generator framework that can be used for generating new files in a consistent manner using templates you define.
